actions.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment creates a study and report on reducing the amount of vehicles in federal fleets and replacing necessary vehicles with ride-sharing services.
purpose: An amendment No. 25 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to create a study and report on reducing the amount of vehicles in federal fleets and replacing necessary vehicles with ride-sharing services.
